name: v0.4.4
body:
Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazelrc-preset.bzl", version = "0.4.4")
```

Then follow more install instructions from the project README.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

name: v0.4.3
body:
Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazelrc-preset.bzl", version = "0.4.3")
```

Then follow more install instructions from the project README.


## What's Changed
* fix: the macro reads a new strict flag by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/50
* fix(migration): this flag is being flipped to empty string (no autoloads) by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/48
* fix: propagate tags to write_source_files by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/51


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3

name: v0.4.0
body:
Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazelrc-preset.bzl", version = "0.4.0")
```

Then follow more install instructions from the project README.


## What's Changed
* Revert "chore: rename to bazelrc_preset" by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/39
* chore: experimental_fetch_all_coverage_outputs by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/37
* Fail early if below bazel 6 by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/41
* feat: set JAVA_HOME for repository rules by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/43
* Add host_jvm_args by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/40
* feat: support migration flags by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/44
* perf: suggest remote_download_outputs minimal rather than toplevel by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/46


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazelrc-preset.bzl", version = "0.2.0")
```

Then follow more install instructions from the project README.


## What's Changed
* Initial implementation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/3
* fix: make our BCR release green by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/5
* Add pre-commit config and CI from rules-template by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/6
* chore(ci): setup testing on Aspect Workflows by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/10
* feat: experimental_repository_downloader_retries by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/9
* Add pretty format for boolean flags by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/12
* feat: add some convenience flags from bazel-lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/14
* feat: add CI-specific flag defaults by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/17
* Enable flag overrides using list of structs in FLAGS by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/16
* feat: more perf flags by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/20
* Expand common for older bazel versions by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/21
* Show delta by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/23
* chore: improve formatting by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/22
* ci: don't print info on passing tests by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/27
* Add remaining convenience flags by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/25
* chore: sandbox_default_allow_network by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/35
* chore: incompatible_default_to_explicit_init_py by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/30
* Add debug flags by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/26
* Verify that overrides use a different command type by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/29
* chore: incompatible_strict_action_env by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/33
* chore: legacy_external_runfiles by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/34
* chore: incompatible_exclusive_test_sandboxed by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/32

## New Contributors
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/3
* @hofbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/pull/6

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazelrc-preset.bzl/commits/v0.2.0
